Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.theme

Interface AppWidgetTheme<T extends AppTheme<?>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AppTheme<T>
    public interface AppWidgetTheme<T extends AppTheme<?>>
extends AppTheme<T>
    Interface to implement an app widget theme.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int OPACITY_DEFAULT
      Default value for the opacity.
      static int OPACITY_MAX
      Maximum value for the opacity.
